analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol:
	Contract I_minter has payable functions:
	 - NewStatic (/unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol#463-464)
	 - NewStaticAdr (/unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol#464-465)
	 - NewRisk (/unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol)
	 - NewRiskAdr (/unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol)
	 - RetRisk (/unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol)
	 - RetStatic (/unique_contracts/0xe82f9867db8c29e37b939f0f404543d15ef70eff.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
